grouped_publications <- publications %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(formatted_entries = paste(
    mapply(
      format_publications,
      author,
      year,
      title,
      journal,
      volume,
      number,
      pages,
      doi,
      SIMPLIFY = FALSE
    ),
    collapse = "\n"
  )) %>% 
  arrange(desc(year))
